title: List Box
behaviorsList: List boxes use a simple table list view to showcase small list tables.
Width and height depend on the container size (minimum height 450px).
Do not use as a data grid or for large OXD lists, as it can be overcrowded for list box views.
Pagination can be used as component support.
Inline editing will be supported for editable items.
A skeleton loader will be displayed while loading the list.
The first 10 items will be loaded first, and the rest will be progressively loaded.
An empty message should be displayed when the list is empty.
